phrases: The script for the Hitotose Troupe's first performance is complete!
The ending might change, depending on how the production works out,
but that is the general idea that I want to go with.
Well, now that the story's come together, that means...
I went out and got the perfect costumes for each of you.
I would love to see you try them on right away!
You are in quite the rush, are not you?
When do most troupes do this?
Right before the show, I think.
the actors line up with their costumes on
So it cannot really be done until right before the show.
There are some things you cannot check on until you have basically finished all rehearsing.
I want to play with all of you in cute costumes!
She is reverted to a child...
If you want to do it that badly, I guess we will have to.
I do not usually wear stuff like this, so it is new to me.
You do not work in the coffee shop at all?
but it was too hard to resist the urge to sneak bites.
Plus, skirts just feel too weird on me.
But it is so loose and billowy, it is hard to move around in.
I cannot run off at full speed.
I do not think you will have many opportunities to run at full speed in the shop...
Hina-chan, you have been helping out in the coffee shop a lot, huh?
Are you used to wearing maid uniforms?
It does not embarrass me as much as it used to.
That is why I got this one for you, Hina-chan!
Is not it a little too revealing, though?
I just need to think of it as the coffee shop's uniform!
I thought Yua-chan would look cute in an apron dress.
Yeah, well, I look cute in anything.
When we stand together like this,
That is not true at all!
When we put Hina-chan and Yua-chan together...
They look like they are from Alice in Wonderland, do not they?
This does not seem much like a fairy tale to me...
Aki-chan has such a nice figure, it was hard to decide.
Something like this could work, too.
They are all so cute, I cannot choose!
None of those are even in the script, though.
I think something like this will look good on Hina-chan and Aki-chan, too!
Hey, those are basically just underwear!
I think they are really frilly and cute, though.
She is taking this way too far.
But if these costumes will make our show better...
Why would you go that far?!
Do you actually want to wear that?!
My mom is coming to visit Hitotose Manor soon.
I wanted her to see our first performance...
So I want to put on a good show and put her mind at ease.
I am sorry it is such a selfish reason, but...
We cannot show Hina-chan's mom a messy shop!
I have to clean up, fast!
Is there a certain way your mom likes her meals flavored?
I will start practicing it now!
Do you think we should wax the floors?
I want to get brand new bookshelves, too!
While we are at it, should we remodel the kitchen, too?
Then we should change the wallpaper.
You guys need to put all that effort toward rehearsing!
You should have told us that earlier.
We are all partners in the Hitotose Troupe.
Of course we will help you.
Just leave it all to us.
Let us put on a great performance, for Hina-chan's mom!
Now that that is all worked out,
why do not we have a toast?
And we can have a snack while we are at it...
It is a little early, but why do not we have dinner?
YOU-Um, who is going to do the toast?
I think the Hitotose Troupe's principal, Hina-chan, should do it.
Go on, do not be shy.
We have all got our drinks.
To the success of the Hitotose Troupe's first performance!
I do not need to study Japanese!
Or so I thought when I did my test and got an awful score!
(I really did it now) I am sure they will want to see my score when I get home......
To think that I got that score in Japanese......
What am I supposed to tell my mom?
I will just keep it a secret until my science test comes back, since I am good at that...
Are you having a costume party today or something?
I came because I heard you had finished the script.
Yes, so we were having a bit of an early dress parade...
Sensei, would you like to wear one, too?
Mayu-chan's switch just got flipped on again!
So this is the route you are taking.
I have been hoping to ask for your advice since I started writing it.
Yes, we do have limited stage space.
This has been such a fulfilling day!
There is still one costume left.
Yeah, like one a princess would wear.
Since we have this, why do not you try it on?
You did say you wanted to be a princess.
And it looks like it is just your size.
It is like it was made-to-order!
You really do look like a princess!
Shall we do a reading right now?
We only have a few weeks until the performance.
We cannot afford to waste a single second.
it might get too late for you to get back home.
Y-You had every intention of spending the night here...
Go on, all you change into your pajamas.
This play takes place in a dream land,
Do not you think pajamas would be the best costume to set the mood?
Um, that is not a dream land.
I will go change right away!
I guess Ruri-chan really does like this sort of thing.
But I did not bring pajamas or anything...
I have some very nice, grown-up ones that would be perfect for you.
Who in the world are you?
You look just like a child.
Despite how I look, I am an adult!
You look so young, I thought you were a child.
Maybe that is a little too grown-up...
The Hitotose Troupe's First Performance A Strange Tale in a Strange Land Starting today at 5:00 PM
Everything went perfectly in rehearsal, but...
You have grown a bit taller, have not you?
I brought some things to cheer you on.
Do you think it is enough?
Oh, it looks like there is some time before the performance.
I am going to check out Tokyo.
Take care of my things, okay?
Your mom's so outgoing, unlike you.
As your landlady, I was hoping to talk to her.
My mom has always been very active, outgoing, and dynamic...
She is the exact opposite of me.
W-Well, lots of kids are nothing like their parents!
My mom was a tea ceremony instructor,
so she was strict about manners.
We do not have the same taste in clothes, either.
My dad is a free spirit,
so I need to do a good job running the shops.
For you, that is a pretty serious problem, huh?
The Hitotose Troupe's First Performance A Strange Tale in a Strange Land Starting today at 5:00 PM Location: Coffee Shop Hitotose
The Hitotose Troupe's First Performance A Strange Tale in a Strange Land Today at 5:00 PM
Have you decided what you would like to order?
This is what we are recommending today.
I ran after the white rabbit.
I was so busy running after it, I somehow ended up upside down mid-air!
I am going to hit the ground!
I closed my eyes tight and braced for impact.
Actually, it feels rather fluffy and soft.
When I lowered my face into the fluff, I heard a mysterious voice.
Do not fluff me without permission!
Startled by that voice, I looked up.
I gently pet the warm, white object...
I have to hurry to the Queen's palace!
I still could not see who the voice belonged to, but it was probably this fluffy object.
I am sorry for fluffing you without permission.
But all I can see is your fur.
I cannot see the ground at all.
I do not even know how to get down.
The audience seats have really filled up.
I-I am still okay right now,
but I feel like I will get nervous when I see my mom...
I will be watching your performance with my mother today.
I have seen her on TV!
I think she is a model...
Everyone in Sensei's family is famous.
Hina-chan is already a scarecrow after seeing Sensei's mom!
Why would you get nervous from seeing someone else's mom?!
Will you flambe that with brandy, then?
Oh, I am sorry, but we do not serve alcoholic beverages here...
It is kind of nerve-wracking to have our families watching, is not it?
I did not really like Parents' Day at school when I was little, either.
When I had to read out loud,
I would accidentally hold my textbook upside-down.
The fox looked at the old man in surprise,
Oh, but I had the whole book memorized, so it was fine.
I once forgot my lines when I was on the stage.
I got through the rest by ad-libbing, but still...
If you keep wishing and never give up,
Yeah, because you are both geniuses...
Actually, if you tell yourself it is okay to mess up,
you will not get as nervous.
I once messed up during a dance recital and fell into the audience,
but I got right back on the stage and kept dancing until the end.
Even I, the great Yua-sama, messes up sometimes!
I never would have recovered from something like that!
Just imagining it makes me start shaking...
What I am saying is that you do not have to be afraid of messing up!
Just remember our play at the culture festival.
That somehow worked out okay, did not it?
So you should not be afraid of making mistakes.
You succeeded in making Hina-chan feel better!
I know I mess up all the time, okay?!
We will be there to help you, so do not worry.
Let us show your mom how cool you can be!
For the sake of all these girls who are supporting me,
I have to make our first performance a success!
I psyched myself up before coming out here, but...
She really is making me nervous!
Before we start, I would like to say a few words as the shop owner.
Our shops, Used Bookstore Hitotose and Coffee Shop Hitotose,
produced this play for the entertainment of customers
What is this place I have come to?
visiting during the shopping district's stamp rally.
Cue cards made with the shop's menu rolls...
This is our theater troupe's very first performance,
Mayu-chan was up all night making them.
but we hope to earn your future support as we move forward from here.
Just look at Mayu-chan standing up as tall as she can to show us our lines,
Also, our stamps for the stamp rally
and it will soothe your soul.
can be collected at the table outside the shop,
Do not just stand still all day!
I will move first, so you just follow me.
They are doing all this just for me...
I am not standing on this stage alone.
What is this place I have come to?
I am going to show my mom
the best play I can put on, with my wonderful friends!
When you cannot do it right, lie down on your back and breathe.
You can tell that your stomach moves up and down, rather than your lungs.
When you get the idea of how to do it lying down, try doing it again standing up!
Try at least 10 times a day Point With abdominal breathing, visualize that you are releasing your breath into your stomach rather than your lungs when you breathe!
but I put you all through so much trouble...
We got everything back on track, so it is fine.
The audience did not seem to mind, either.
You were not moving at all in the beginning,
so I thought you were playing a scarecrow or something.
But then you acted out your part until the very end.
You have put your mom's mind at ease.
It is because of all of you!
I am so glad I came to Hitotose Manor!
Well, it is time to catch my bullet train, so I will be going.
Girls, take care of Hinako for me!
From One Year to the Next
since Hina-chan came to Hitotose Manor.
I hope next year will be a good year, too.
Next time, From One Year to the Next.
